meanings.definition: To condescend reluctantly and with a strong sense of the affront to one's superiority
meanings.sent1: She rarely deigns to speak to us common folk.
meanings.sent2: The queen deigns to attend the annual ball.
meanings.sent3: The cat deigns to grace us with its presence when it wants food.
meanings.sent4: The celebrity deigns to acknowledge the existence of their fans.
meanings.sent5: The professor deigns to answer questions only from the most attentive students.

meanings.definition: To think fit or in accordance with one's dignity
meanings.sent1: He deigns to wear only the finest clothes.
meanings.sent2: She deigns to accept the award graciously.
meanings.sent3: The picky eater deigns to eat only organic food.
meanings.sent4: The artist deigns to display their work in prestigious galleries.
meanings.sent5: The CEO deigns to meet with important clients personally.
